metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2978 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw use after free in the Linux kernel NILFS file system was found inthe way user triggers function security_inode_alloc to fail with followingcall to function nilfs_mdt_destroy. A local user could use this flaw tocrash the system or potentially escalate their privileges on the system.
